SELECT pos.* FROM rfid_position pos WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY pos.pos_level, pos.sort_num
SELECT count(*) FROM rfid_position pos WHERE 1=1

SELECT T1.pos_no AS pos_no01 , T2.pos_no AS pos_no02 , T3.pos_no AS pos_no03 , T4.pos_no AS pos_no04 , T5.pos_no AS pos_no05 , T6.pos_no AS pos_no06 , T7.pos_no AS pos_no07 , T8.pos_no AS pos_no08 FROM rfid_position T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T2 ON T1.parent_pos_no = T2.pos_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T3 ON T2.parent_pos_no = T3.pos_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T4 ON T3.parent_pos_no = T4.pos_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T5 ON T4.parent_pos_no = T5.pos_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T6 ON T5.parent_pos_no = T6.pos_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T7 ON T6.parent_pos_no = T7.pos_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T8 ON T7.parent_pos_no = T8.pos_no WHERE T1.use_yn = 'Y'
AND ( T1.pos_no LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR T1.pos_name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') )
AND 1 = 2

SELECT pos.* ,T2.pos_name as parent_pos_name ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM002', pos.use_yn) AS use_yn_str FROM rfid_position pos LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_position T2 ON pos.parent_pos_no = T2.pos_no WHERE pos.POS_NO = #{posNo}
